response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and is priced at $1,200,000. Given its exceptional quality and rarity, it is a significant investment that could potentially yield substantial returns for you. We believe in creating long-term partnerships and are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of unparalleled service and support throughout the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
